title: Deny Me If You Can
description: TO SAVE HER SISTER'S LIFE, SHE MUST BE HIS PREY FOR ONE NIGHT.Megan’s sister is dying, and the only one who can save her is the Vampire King Jaromir. His blood can heal, and Megan will do anything to get her hands on it, even agree to be his prey for one night. If Megan can stay away from him the whole night, she’ll get what she came for, but if she fails, she must give in to him.Losing doesn’t sound so bad, especially when the Vampire King is one of the most attractive men Megan has ever seen. But if she loses, her sister will die. So now Megan must make a choice. Her sister’s life, or the Vampire King’s passionate embrace.Enchanted Ever After is a series for those who enjoy reading stories about love, passion, and supernatural beings like elves, vampires, and more. Each book can be read as a stand-alone.
author: Nellie C. Lind
